parameter.name: enableUrlRewrite
parameter.description: Whether to enable/disable URL rewrite in the response payload.

parameter.name: baseUrl
parameter.description: Optional base URL to be replaced in the response.

parameter.name: serverUrl
parameter.description: Public server URL for URL rewrite.

parameter.name: category
parameter.description: Refine a search for Flag resources by category.

parameter.name: encounter
parameter.description: Refine a search for Flag resources by encounter.

parameter.name: patient
parameter.description: Search for Flag resources for a specified patient ID. You can use "patient" or "subject" equivalently, but they cannot be used at the same time for different references.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Refine a search for Flag resources by status.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: Search for Flag resources for a specified patient ID. You can use "patient" or "subject" equivalently, but they cannot be used at the same time for different references.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: FHIR resource IDs for the desired resources. If _id is used in a search, all other parameters will be ignored.
